title: The Epic of Zektbach OVA
alternative_title: The Epic of Zektbach　第一章　シャムシールの舞
description: The story begins when the kingdom of Noigllado suddenly invades the small country of Azuelgatt and brings it to the brink of destruction. General Adnowell leads Noigllado’s troops against Azuelgatt’s final, remaining line of defense: the fortress Doroah, led by a skilled female warrior named Shamshir.
